post:
Shine Servers LLP is a privately held professional Indian based web hosting company founded in 2010. Shine Servers offers the most comprehensive range of secure, fully protected and private web hosting services in the world. All Shared, VPS & Dedicated Servers are located at SmartDC Datacenter in Netherlands. All equipments including servers of Shine Servers LLP are placed in a private corridor inside the SmartDC. Our network consists of the best connections like AMS-IX, DECIX, L-INX, Tinet, NTT, Telia and Level3. Shine Servers manages her own global IPv4/IPv6 network (AS202905). This premium network consists of multiple big and small transit providers and is linked to the biggest Internet Exchanges in Europe. This mix of different providers and Internet Exchanges guarantees maximal performance. Low Latency and availability are the essence of the Shine Servers Premium Network.*

We understand that every minute down is a minute too much.

Shine Servers is now offering the following, aggressively priced, server configurations to the this community! There has never been a better time to check out Shine Servers.*

Accelerate your website hosting with our high-performance web hosting platform.

We aren’t your typical website hosting provider. Our entire hosting platform is built by our expert staff with performance in mind. We utilize extremely fast SSD (Solid State Drive) storage for your databases and files.

Included with all Shared Hosting accounts:
- RAID10 SSD System
- Multiple Web Site builders
- Multiple CMS instant installs
- SSH available upon request
- Ruby on Rails
- Attracta SEO Tools
- MySQL, PHP, Perl, Curl
- cPanel + Softaculous
- Instant install of over 300+ scripts
- WordPress and Joomla Optimized
- Lightspeed Web Servers Optimized
- Premium 24/7 Technical Support
- 100% Uptime Guarantee
- 30 Day Money Back Guarantee*
- CloudLinux & CDN By Cloudflare
- Daily/Weekly Backups
- Webmail (Roundcube, Horde, SquirrelMail)*
- CURL, ImageMagick, GD, PHP 5, MySQL 5, CGI, IonCube, Zend Optimizer and much more!
- Weekly Virus scanning
- Advanced Spam protection
- Extremely secure hosting environment
- ZERO Overselling Guarantee


Payment Mode : PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, Bitcoin & Payza

Promotion #1: Flat 35% Recurring
Order our any Shared Hosting Plan using 35% OFF Coupon Code. This package gives you the discount of FLAT 35% On Any Shared Hosting Plan Every Month. Don't miss this amazing deal available in our Netherlands Locations.
Note; Only Valid For New Orders

Promotion Code: WebHosting2017

Free Setup!: Get your server setuped for free!*
That means we'll setup your server for free of cost!

Free Migration! : We will move all your stuffs from your old host for free without any cost .
We give you the freedom and ease to get hosted with us . We will transfer eveything from your old host to Us without any cost .


Still aren't sure? Ok let me try to convince again :*

Not only is that incentive, we'll help you move! In most cases, we'll do all the work! Just contact us for details!
